participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Energetic and caring, always enthusiastic about life and new experiences.
participant_1.background: I'm always on the go and my glasses are always dirty, so I take them off and clean them every time I get a chance. I like to go to the farmers markets to buy local veggies and fruits. I hate red meat. My favorite rapper is Yo Gotti. I couldn't be a school teacher like my father because I'm blind.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and supportive, focused on family and eager to embrace new challenges.
participant_2.background: I will be helping my girlfriend prepare for the baby shower. I keep up with my family but I am not always sure if they keep up with me. I like tailgate parties. I like fitness. I spent my last birthday with my wife at a fancy restaurant, which was nice, but I would rather have gone to the Galapagos Islands again.

content.text: Hey! I'm so excited for my girlfriend's baby shower this weekend. How are you doing today?
Hey! I'm doing okay. I'm going to be helping out with the shower so I'm a little nervous. I'm sure it will be fine though.
Oh that's great! I bet you'll do a great job. I love going to baby showers, they're always so much fun. Are you excited to be a dad?
Yeah I am! I'm not sure what to expect but I'm sure it will be a lot of fun.
I'm sure it will be. I'm not a dad myself but I have a lot of friends who are and they all say it's the best thing ever.
That's what I hear. I'm excited to find out for myself.
Well I'm sure it will be great. And I'm sure you'll be a great dad.
Thanks! I'm trying to learn as much as I can about it.
That's great. I'm sure you'll do fine.
Thanks! I hope so.
So what else do you have going on this weekend?
Not much, just hanging out with my family and friends.
That sounds fun. I'm going to be going to the farmers market to buy some fresh produce.
Oh that sounds nice. I love going to the farmers market.
Yeah, it's always fun to see what they have.
Do you have any favorite vegetables?
I love all vegetables but I think my favorite is probably broccoli.
Broccoli is good! I like it too.
So what's your favorite thing to do at the farmers market?
I like to just walk around and look at all the different things. And I like to try new things.
That sounds fun. I like to do that too.
So what do you think you're going to get at the farmers market today?
I'm not sure yet. I'm going to have to look around and see what they have.
Okay. Well I'm sure you'll find something good.
Thanks! I hope so.
